title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Volocity - Manually configure a flight plan
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can configure our flight plan manually in our navigation system from our Volocity. 

The Route being configure will be from Rotterdam The Hague Airport (EHRD) to a Amsterdam Schiphol Airport (EHRD) But to show the full potential of the Garmin navigation system we will modify our flight by adding a departure approach and changing active legs etc.
